name: Naniverse
description:
NANIVERSE

Through a microscope and a laser point, prevent the nanites from losing control and restore the universe of nanites to normality. The ultimate goal is to save everyone

Se trata de salvar todos los nanites, con el uso del láser que se activa haciendo clic con el ratón sobre una esfera.

If it collides with a good (green) nanit it will be destroyed, although some are more resistant

If it collides with an enemy nanit (red) it will split into two of the good type, although some are more resistant.

Use the laser to separate spaces between two spheres of the same color

Up to level 2 you can only use celestial energy from then on you can use yellow energy.

With the mouse wheel you can increase the zoom of the microscope on your screen to see better and moving the mouse moves the screen.

Computer Controls:

Mouse left click to make the laser cut

Mouse wheel to zoom in or out.

The less time you can reach 0 enemies with the least amount of nanites eliminated, is better.
